name: getclimatescorebygps
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool rankiteo_climate_risk_assessment.
Tool description: We provide an API to give a climate risk assessment score for any locations in the world.

API description: Get climate score for a specific location mapped to some industries/disasters with a given gps position.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the location.

disaster_type_number.description:

1 : Air Quality
2 : Earthquake
3 : Floods

5 : Sea Level Rise 
6 : Tropical
